tag_list: basil, farano, creative, mobile, apps, social, social-gaming, marketing, gamification, fresh-concepts, stylmee, fashion
overview:
Founding Partner, Creative Director & Business Development Fresh Concepts Labs

Basil has spent 15 years working within the clothing and fashion industry. He was responsible for the operations and brand management for several brand licenses in North America. After being introduced to the iPhone from a close friend, he had a vision of the future. For the last two years Basil has been devoting his life to the development of his company; Fresh Concepts Labs and specifically it’s first product; Stylmee. Basil is a creative strategist who has an understanding of brand building and development.
He has a passion for creative, mobile, social gaming, marketing strategy development and implementation. He is, as what his Linked In profile describes as a life long student of a better way, and always having an open mind and ear.
